籤詩版本二:
Amagugu ayigugu namagugu kufihlwe ngaphakathi Kungani kudingeka ubheke i-jade ezweni langaphandle?
Kungcono ukulinda ukuhlakanipha komuntu ohlakaniphile futhi ukhululeke kakhudlwana.
詩意:
Le hexagram ifihla isithombe esitholakala ku-jade.
Konke kungenziwa ngesikhathi esifanele.
解曰: Iqukethe igolide ne-jade. Angazi ukuthi yini okumele uyibheke. Hlangana nesiqondiso sakho. Asikho isidingo sokukhathazeka.
籤詩故事一:
◇Lima igolide futhi uqashe umusa
UCheng Yaojin wayengumsunguli woBukhosi BamaTang. Ngolunye usuku, uRengui wayesalele ezintabeni. Ngokushesha wathola uYaojin ejahwa ingwe njengoba edlula. URengui wambamba, walimala ingwe, futhi wasindisa uYaojin .
U-Yaojin wayithanda i-karate kaRengui, wamnika umcibisholo we-Jinling, wamcela ukuba ajoyine ibutho lezempi.
U-Xue Rengui kamuva waba ujenene woBukhosi BamaTang.
聖意: Thandazela umuzi wakho kanye nokuphepha kwakho, ukhulekele ingcebo yakho, ulindele ukuthi umshado wakho uhlehliswe.Abesilisa abahamba ngezinyawo eLiujia bavimba amasimu, izikelemu sezivuthiwe, futhi imfuyo eyisithupha iyachuma.Bafuna abantu. , ezabasebenzi, namacala omphakathi.Ukufuduka kuyinto enhle futhi elahlekile.Izifo zasenyakatho zitholwa odokotela abalungile.Amathuna asezintabeni kufanele ashintshwe.
